content: विषं [विष्-क] {@--1@} Poison, venom (said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also in this sense); विषं भवतु मा भूद्वा फटाटोपो भयंकरः <ls>Pt. 1. 204.</ls> {@--2@} Water; विषं जलधरैः पीतं मूर्छिताः पथिकांगनाः <ls>Chandr. 5. 82</ls> (where both senses are intended). {@--3@} The fibres of a lotus-stalk. {@--4@} Gummyrrh.
